April 5, 1981 D North East Midlands Contest (Fourth Section)
North East Midlands Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest North East Midlands Contest north-east-midlands-contest-fourth-section
Four Little Maids
Festival Hall, Kirkby-in-Ashfield, Nottinghamshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £75 and trophy, 2nd £55 and trophy, 3rd £40. March contest - 1st Rhodian Brass (176 points). 12 bands competed,.
